name: Tom Swifties Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
toothpaste.

	Crest (brand of toothpaste) + dropped = crestfallen

questions.text: "The Ph is too low," said Tom _____.
questions.explanation:
acidly.

	High Ph = Alkaline.  Low Ph = Acid.

cursive.

	It's kind of obvious when you see it.

questions.text: "I've come from the Dog Star," Tom said _______.
"May I introduce the Family Stone?" Tom asked _____.
questions.explanation:
slyly.

	Refers to the musical group, Sly & the Family Stone.

questions.text: "The piping, woodland goat-boy is deceased," Tom _______.
questions.explanation:
deadpanned.

	Pan the 'piping goat-boy' of mythology + deceased = deadpanned.

questions.text: "I have a ______ personality," said Tom, being frank.
questions.explanation:
split.

	If Tom is Frank, that's an alternate personality if I ever saw one.
